Combining like terms, 12x^2 y - 8x^2 y^2 + 11x^2 y - 4x^3 y^2 - 9xy^2

\begin{array}{l}\n\frac{v}{0} \\\n\frac{0}{0} \\\n\frac{8}{10} \\\n12 x^{2} y-8 x^{2} y^{2}+11 x^{2} y-4 x^{3} y^{2}-9 x y^{2}\n\end{array}[imath]\frac{v}{0} [/imath] [imath]\frac{0}{0} [/imath] [imath]\frac{8}{10} [/imath] [imath]12 x^{2} y-8 x^{2} y^{2}+11 x^{2} y-4 x^{3} y^{2}-9 x y^{2}[/imath]
